additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclotetrasiloxane, Dimethiconol, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Parfum, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Citral, Citronellol, Coumarin, Limonene, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool.

description: A treatment oil for all hair types. Moroccan Argan Oil helps to nourish split ends, reduce frizz, and add softness and shine for smoother, silkier hair.
name: Treatment Smooth Oil
